details.title: Performance of the adaptive generalised matched subspace constant false alarm rate detector in non-Gaussian noise: an experimental analysis

authors.affiliation: Ecole Militaire Polytechnique, BP 17 Bordj El Bahri, Algiers, Algeria
authors.name: A. Younsi

authors.affiliation: Dipartimento di Ingegneria dell'Informazione, Universita  di Pisa, via G. Caruso, Pisa 14-I-56122, Italy
authors.name: M. Greco

authors.affiliation: Dipartimento di Ingegneria dell'Informazione, Universita  di Pisa, via G. Caruso, Pisa 14-I-56122, Italy
authors.name: F. Gini

authors.affiliation: Signal Processing Group, Darmstadt University of Technology, Merckstrabe 25, Darmstadt D-64283, Germany
authors.name: A.M. Zoubir

details.abstract: The authors deal with the performance analysis of an adaptive version of the generalised matched subspace detector (GMSD) in compound-Gaussian clutter with unknown covariance matrix. The original GMSD was proposed to detect subspace signals in compound-Gaussian noise with known covariance matrix and ensures the constant false alarm rate (CFAR) property. In real situations, this assumption is unrealistic, which means that the covariance matrix must be estimated from training data. The authors use a robust estimate of the covariance matrix called the fixed-point estimate, recently proposed in the literature. The performance of the obtained adaptive detector, in terms of CFAR behaviour and probability of detection, is evaluated in the presence of real sea clutter data, collected by the McMaster IPIX radar.

ieee.title: An adaptive detector for detecting target in clutter plus Gaussian noise background
ieee.displayText: Shiwen Lei, Zhiqin Zhao, Zaiping Nie, Qing-Huo Liu, "An adaptive detector for detecting target in clutter plus Gaussian noise background", Signal Processing (ICSP) 2014 12th International Conference on, pp. 1919-1924, 2014, ISSN 2164-5221.

ieee.title: Optimal Design of Large Dimensional Adaptive Subspace Detectors

ieee.title: The analysis of equivalent sample of correlated data
ieee.displayText: Yan-Ling Shi, "The analysis of equivalent sample of correlated data", Image and Signal Processing (CISP) 2013 6th International Congress on, vol. 03, pp. 1613-1617, 2013.
